item.title: NPC Drops
item.dc:creator: @Timothay Timothay
item.description:
@Timothay wrote:

I want my NPCâ€™s to drop, but what do I edit in this file, it reads as follows.

[code]public class NPCDrops {
public int npcId;
public int DropType;
public int[] Items = new int[100];
public int[] ItemsN = new int[100];

public NPCDrops(int _npcId) {
	npcId = _npcId;
	for (int i = 0; i < Items.length; i++) {
		Items[i] = -1;
		ItemsN[i] = 0;
	}
}

}[/code]
